1.content:
STAR WARS: The Rise of Darth Plumpus

A galaxy divided! The Clone Wars continue to rage on and take its toll on those involved. Among them is former Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano, who was accused of murder and involvement in a bombing on the Jedi Temple. She attempted to plead her innocence, but with the exception of her master, Anakin Skywalker, none believed her. Later it was revealed Ahsoka's best friend, Bariss Offee, was the real culprit behind the temple bombing and with that, Ahsoka was offered a chance to returned to the Jedi order, which she refused because of their lack of trust. Now the young Togruta travels the galaxy, trying to stay out of the affairs of the Republic and the Separatists.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------

Ahsoka Tano sat inside a Cantina on Nar Shaddaa, sighing as she looked at her drink, it was pretty clear she was still upset at the betrayal of her best friend and from the distrust of the Jedi. She had pretty much completely abandoned that life, with the only thing left of it being her lightsabers, which she couldn't bring herself to get rid of since she built them herself. As she sat there, listening to the music, she saw a shady salesman at a nearby table selling items he clearly stole. While normally Ahsoka wouldn't care, she noticed something. One of the items in particular was of Sith origin, specifically, it was an old Sith Holocron. Ahsoka knew it was probably broken though, because if it wasn't, it would have likely had a negative effect on her just from looking at her. Still, broken or not, something like that shouldn't be left out in the open like that. Ahsoka decided the best thing to do, Ex-Jedi or not, was to buy the holocron and destroy it. Ahsoka walked up to the merchant, who was a rather obese Twi'Lek, with most of her body, which was so fat she could put a hutt to shame, covered up in a very large black bed sheet made to look like a robe. The merchant then looked at Ahsoka and smiled.

Merchant: What're ya buyin?

Ahsoka: Prehapse that holocron you have.

Merchant: that old piece of junk? You can have it. I've been trying to get rid of it for months!

Ahsoka: well ok then.

Ahsoka took the holocron and left with it. Putting it in her pocket, Ahsoka headed for her ship to dispose of the Holocron, which she didn't realize had begun to turn on. Ahsoka stopped as her stomach let out a light hungry growl, and she could have sworn she heard a nagging voice in the back of her head telling her to eat. Thinking nothing of it, she decided to stop by a restaurant for something quick to eat. She ordered a small meal, before subconsciously ordering a feast as she heard a voice in the back of her head.

???: Eat'.

Ahsoka thought she must have just been hearing things due to all the stress. When her 'meal' arrived, Ahsoka was surprised at how much she got. There was so much food there wasn't enough room on the table for it all. Ahsoka was about to request her order to be changed, but then that nagging voice told her to eat again, and before she knew it, that was exactly what she was doing. She grabbed some food and began to wolf it down, filling her stomach with delicious alien foods. But she began to realize she was eating a lot more than she should be, which was evident by her swelling stomach. She continued to stuff herself silly as the voice seemed to get louder and more noticeable.

???: Yes my young Togruta, eat. Give in to your gluttony and devour all that delicious food.

Ahsoka couldn't help herself, the more she ate, the better the food tasted. She became an unwilling puppet to her own gluttony. Her belly ballooned out bigger and bigger, ripping her outfit as it grew, followed by her arms, legs, hips, breasts, butt, and' well' pretty much everything else. She groaned as she ate the last piece of food laid out on the table, only a pile of dishes were left of the massive feast as the now 600lbs. Togruta felt like she'd explode if she ate anymore. Naked and barely mobile, Ahsoka hefted herself up, making her new bean bag sized gut bounce rather uncomfortably. She began to look over the damage her binge had done. Her face had become rounder with puffy cheeks and a thick layer of fat having formed on her neck, her breasts ballooning to easily well over normal sizes. If she had to guess, probably J-cups. Her butt was equally massive, looking like one butt cheek would take an entire chair for itself. Her limbs had billowed out to be rather thick and her hands and feet had ballooned slightly as well, but the biggest change was unquestionably her stomach, which was by far the biggest part of her new frame. Ahsoka panicked when she thought of the bill, but then the voice started talking to her again.

???: Don't worry Darth Plumpus, simply used a Jedi Mind Trick on the employees and you'll be able to leave without any problems.

Ahsoka was getting worried about this voice, and now that she was thinking about it, where was the Sith Holocron? It was no longer among the tattered remains of her clothes. But what worried her more was what the voice was calling her. Darth Plumpus? That sounded like a Sith name, and Ahsoka definitely wanted nothing to do with them. But it had a point, the bill was bound to be huge! It looked like she'd have no choice, when suddenly a Hutt, who happened to have watched Ahsoka's binge, slithered over to her along with a droid.

Hutt: *speaking in native Hutt language*

Droid: The great Bascus the Hutt noticed your meal young Togruta and would like to offer you a deal. In exchange for coming to work for him, he's willing to pay your bill in full and cover any other expenses you might have.

Ahsoka thought that over for a moment. While that definitely sounded good, she was perfectly familiar with Hutts, and was aware the hutt might turn her into some kind of fat slave. She wasn't sure what to do.

He simply wanted Ahsoka to take care of an infestation he had. speaking in his native urs, Bascus the hutt explained this to Ahsoka, which of course, the droid translated. "The great Bascus the hutt hopes that you have room for dessert, for he will reward you even further if you can deal with a Thimiar infestation here on this ship." The Teenage Togruta put her hands to her big stomach. "I don't know, Thimiar's don't really agree with me." The hutt, of course, spoke in a disappointed tone. "If you do not take care of this infestation, there are other things you can do." Ahsoka thought for a moment and...
12.title: Trust the Hutt (Ahsoka does not become a slave)

choices: her stomach demanded more. (eats until she explodes, but survives)
the police walk up to her
she's approached by a scientist, who is fascinated by her size
13.content:
In a panic, Ahsoka tried using a Jedi Mind Trick on the owner of the restaurant, and it worked, Ahsoka's meal became entirely free, and she was able to leave without any problems. Though now Ahsoka felt really dirty, and with good reason. She technically stole a lot of food, and there was no way she could return it. All she could do was waddle away, her belly painfully full, threatening to burst like a water balloon at any moment. That nagging voice from before seemed to return to her, much more noticable than before. "Ah, doesn't this feel good Darth Plumpus? You're so much more beautiful now." Ahsoka tried her hardest to calm her stomach down, but it hurt so much. She thought swallowing a thermal detonator would be less painful than this.

"I feel like I'm about to explode." She whimpered out, eventually being forced to sit and rest when...
13.title: Try and use a Jedi mind trick (it works)

Ventress her foe to become ally.
151.content: Ahsoka leave, but want others to become fat and powerful like her and want Barriss, Aayla, Luminara, Shaak Ti, and even Ventress to join her. Who does she go after first?
151.title: Option 1

1511.title: Barriss the love of her life.

152.content:
Ahsoka Tano sat inside a Cantina on Nar Shaddaa, sighing as she looked at her drink, it was pretty clear she was still upset at the betrayal of her best friend and from the distrust of the Jedi. She had pretty much completely abandoned that life, with the only thing left of it being her lightsabers, which she couldn't bring herself to get rid of since she built them herself. As she sat there, listening to the music, she saw a shady salesman at a nearby table selling items she clearly stole. While normally Ahsoka wouldn't care, she noticed something. One of the items in particular was of jedi origin, specifically, it was an old Jedi Holocron. Ahsoka knew it was probably broken though, because if it wasn't, it would have likely helped alleviate her woes just from looking at her. Still, broken or not, something like that shouldn't be left out in the open like that. Ahsoka decided the best thing to do, Ex-Jedi or not, was to buy the holocron and use it. Ahsoka walked up to the merchant, who was a rather obese Twi'Lek, with most of her body, which was so fat she could put a hutt to shame, covered up in a very large black bed sheet made to look like a robe. The merchant then looked at Ahsoka and smiled.

Merchant: "What're ya buyin?"

Ahsoka: "Perhaps that holocron you have."

Merchant: "That old piece of junk? You can have it. I've been trying to get rid of it for months!"

Ahsoka: "Thanks."

Ahsoka took the holocron and left with it. Putting it in her pocket, Ahsoka headed for her ship to store it, which she didn't realize had begun to turn on. Ahsoka stopped as her stomach let out a light hungry growl, and she could have sworn she heard a soothing voice in the back of her head telling her to eat. Thinking nothing of it, she decided to stop by a restaurant for something quick to eat. She ordered a small meal, before subconsciously ordering a feast as she heard a voice in the back of her head.

???: Eat'.

Ahsoka thought she must have just been hearing things due to all the stress. When her 'meal' arrived, Ahsoka was surprised at how much she got. There was so much food there wasn't enough room on the table for it all. Ahsoka was about to request her order to be changed, but then that voice told her to eat again, and before she knew it, that was exactly what she was doing. She grabbed some food and began to wolf it down, filling her stomach with delicious alien foods. But she began to realize she was eating a lot more than she should be, which was evident by her swelling stomach. She continued to stuff herself silly as the voice seemed to get louder and more noticeable.

???: Yes my young Togruta, eat. Treat yourself!

Ahsoka couldn't help herself, the more she ate, the better the food tasted. She became an unwilling puppet to her own gluttony. Her belly ballooned out bigger and bigger, straining her outfit as it grew, followed by her arms, legs, hips, breasts, butt, and' well' pretty much everything else. She groaned as she ate the last piece of food laid out on the table, only a pile of dishes were left of the massive feast as the now 600lbs. Togruta felt like she'd explode if she ate anymore. Ahsoka hefted herself up, making her new bean bag sized gut bounce slightly uncomfortably. She began to look over the damage her binge had done. Her face had become rounder with puffy cheeks and a sllight layer of fat having formed on her neck, her breasts ballooning to a little over normal sizes. If she had to guess, probably D-cups. Her butt was equally massive, looking like it could fill a throne. Her limbs had billowed out to be somewhat thick and her hands and feet had ballooned slightly as well, but the biggest change was unquestionably her stomach, which was by far the biggest part of her new frame, hanging over her belt. Ahsoka panicked when she thought of the bill, but then the voice started talking to her again.

???: Don't worry Ahsoka, simply used a Jedi Mind Trick on the employees and they should understand.
Ahsoka was ready to attempt this, when suddenly a young female Hutt, who happened to have watched Ahsoka's binge with a hint of admiration, slithered over to her.

Hutt: "Hello there young togruta! I, the passionate Pooja the Hutt have seen your amazing eating skills and and would like to offer you a date. In exchange for coming to being my girlfriend, I'm willing to pay your bill in full and cover any other expenses you might have, you cutie rancor gut."

Ahsoka blushed as thought that over for a moment. While that definitely sounded good, she was perfectly familiar with Hutts, and was aware the hutt might turn her into some kind of fat slave. But she seemed adamant is just just giving her a "date". She wasn't sure what to do.
152.title: Pampering jedi holocron

choices: Pooja tricked her, Ahsoka is a slave now!
1522.content: whilst Ahsoka mulled over her predicament, the patient voice spoke up "Don't worry pudgy, that hutt will take care of you." With caution, Ahsoka accepted Pooja's offer, who then paid for her gluttony. The hutt then took Ahsoka's hand and led her to her ship, making small talk and rubbing Ahsoka's belly. when they arrived
1522.title: Hutt date

choices: Pooja feeds her and she is stuck to a chair
15223.content: Pooja lead her into a skiff. She blushed as the skiff rocked as she waddled on. They skiff stopped at a giant building. She struggled onto the platform. She walked beside the hutt. The building was massive. Everything was big enough for a hutt. At that thought she looked down at her gut. She was disgusted in herself
15223.title: Pooja tricked her, Ahsoka is a slave now!
